nodes.text: Warrior-seer was the title conferred upon a Yuuzhan Vong who performed the dual tasks of warrior and seer. The bridging of the two castes—that of warrior and priest—was intended to allow for the will of the Yuuzhan Vong gods to be studied and supplicated during the prosecution of warfare. Warrior-seers provided both religious and tactical advice to senior commanders. During the last year of the Yuuzhan Vong War, Warmaster Nas Choka was counseled by his personal warrior-seer.
